title.heading: GOD LOVES YOU AND CREATED YOU TO KNOW HIM PERSONALLY.

panel.text: God showed how much he loved us by sending his one and only Son into the world so that we might have eternal life through him.

button.buttontext: God Wants You to Know Him

panel.text: And this is the way to have eternal life - to know you, the only true God, and Jesus Christ, the one you sent to earth.

page.question: Why do you think most people don't know God personally?
